summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Marketing Website and Admin Console Website CMS. All features working correctly - marketing website loads on port 3001, navigation works, contact form submits demo requests, and Admin Console CMS displays and manages leads.
passed_tests: Marketing website homepage loads at localhost:3001
Marketing website navigation (Product, Use Cases, About, Contact pages)
Demo request validation (missing required fields returns 422)
Admin login and access to Admin Console
Website CMS section loads under DEVELOPERS
Admin demo requests filter by status
Admin update demo request status - PUT /api/marketing/admin/demo-requests/{id}
seed_data_creation: Created test demo requests via API and Playwright form submission
context_for_next_testing_agent: Marketing website runs on port 3001 (served with 'serve' package). Main TMS frontend runs on port 3000. Backend runs on port 8001. Admin login is at /auth route. Website CMS is under DEVELOPERS section in Admin Console sidebar. All marketing APIs are prefixed with /api/marketing/. Admin endpoints require platform_admin role.

marketing_website.homepage: Working - dark theme, hero section, stats, navigation
marketing_website.contact_page: Working - form with all fields, submission works

admin_console_cms.demo_requests_list: Working - shows all leads with status badges
admin_console_cms.stats_dashboard: Working - Total Leads, New Requests, Contacted, Converted
admin_console_cms.request_details: Working - expandable cards with email, phone, role, fleet size, message
